languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс испытующе смотрит на вас — а затем едва заметно, словно не хочет, чтобы это увидел кто-то другой, качает головой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс испытующе смотрит на вас — а затем едва заметно, словно не хочет, чтобы это увидел кто-то другой, качает головой.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс испытующе смотрит на вас — а затем едва заметно, словно не хочет, чтобы это увидел кто-то другой, качает головой.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}
{n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}
{n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}
{n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}
{n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスがこちらを素早く観察した。そして、誰にも見られたくないかのように、かすかに首を振る。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスがこちらを素早く観察した。そして、誰にも見られたくないかのように、かすかに首を振る。{/n}

languages.text: {n}海因里希仔细打量了你片刻，之后以非常轻微的幅度摇了摇头，似乎不想被任何人察觉。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希仔细打量了你片刻，之后以非常轻微的幅度摇了摇头，似乎不想被任何人察觉。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix te estudia por un momento... y sacude la cabeza ligeramente, como si no quisiera que nadie más lo viera.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix te estudia por un momento... y sacude la cabeza ligeramente, como si no quisiera que nadie más lo viera.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix vous observe quelques instants, avant de secouer la tête presque imperceptiblement, comme s'il ne voulait être vu que de vous.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix vous observe quelques instants, avant de secouer la tête presque imperceptiblement, comme s'il ne voulait être vu que de vous.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix mustert dich einen Augenblick – und schüttelt dann ganz leicht den Kopf, als solle es sonst niemand sehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix mustert dich einen Augenblick – und schüttelt dann ganz leicht den Kopf, als solle es sonst niemand sehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Heinrix bir süre seni inceliyor ve sonra da kimsenin görmesini istemezmiş gibi hafifçe başını sallıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix studies you for a moment — then ever so slightly, as if not wanting anyone else to see, shakes his head.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix bir süre sana bakıyor ve sonra sanki kimsenin görmesini istemezmiş gibi hafifçe başını sallıyor.{/n}
